about.main: netizen.org propels curious citizens of the ‘net beyond problematic defaults towards a more creative, playful, and equitable digital world. We are a collective of new media artists, educators, and activists on a mission to reestablish human agency in the information age through public lectures, workshops, digital tools, online events, and festivals.

initiatives.main: At netizen.org, our goal is to transform “users” into “netizens” (citizens of the Internet) who are critically engaged with the digital technologies that make up our networked environment. While the projects featured here vary in their format, from interactive online platforms to participatory in-person events, they all share a commitment to this central mission: empowering individuals to understand, question, and creatively shape the digital world.
